title: 7 October 2019 - International Uprising - Movement of Movements - Extinction Rebellion
abstract: Mass participation civil disobedience to shut down the government, to achieve the emergency action needed to tackle the crisis.
description:
Extinction Rebellion has become a phenomenon. We are growing rapidly every day. Allied movements are now joining our strategy of joyful nonviolent rebellion. This International Rebellion is our best chance yet. We must prepare to win.

But the collapse of our climate and ecosystems has begun. 
Wildfires are ripping across the arctic. Ice is melting at speeds never thought possible. Deadly heatwaves are crippling countries around the world. Scientists express their panic daily. 

TELL THE TRUTH
